Lotto: Powerball jackpot rolls over to $20 million, Aucklander wins $1m First Division prize https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lotto-are-you-17-million-richer-numbers-revealed-for-powerball-draw/4F7GXCGPYZBANGR32HX2JFDB7Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lotto-are-you-17-million-richer-numbers-revealed-for-powerball-draw/4F7GXCGPYZBANGR32HX2JFDB7Y/ Twelve lucky punters have been crowned Lotto multimillionaires in 2024. Wed, 17 Jul 2024 08:36:44 +0000 Tonight’s numbers are 11, 19, 15, 31, 13, 38. The bonus ball was 7 and the Powerball was 8.
Nelson man who posted Snapchat video of sex with underage girl loses name suppression https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nelson-man-who-posted-sex-video-with-underage-girl-fighting-to-keep-identity-secret/5PGLHSLNEZAUPL3KK4ZZNOYSXQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nelson-man-who-posted-sex-video-with-underage-girl-fighting-to-keep-identity-secret/5PGLHSLNEZAUPL3KK4ZZNOYSXQ/ Tracy NealHis father was worried about the humiliation that would follow his son being named. Wed, 17 Jul 2024 07:43:52 +0000 Nelson man Lachlan Quigley who posted a video to Snapchat of him having sex with an underage girl has lost his bid for name suppression. Photo / 123rf
Hokitika fatal house fire: Former wife describes victim, 87, as ‘an incredible man’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hokitika-fatal-housefire-woman-describes-victim-as-an-incredible-man/I7KC227ILBF6JJP6754DZ4Y2GA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hokitika-fatal-housefire-woman-describes-victim-as-an-incredible-man/I7KC227ILBF6JJP6754DZ4Y2GA/ Katie OliverHenry Matawai-Russel died tragically in his Hokitika home after a fire broke out. Wed, 17 Jul 2024 07:30:00 +0000 Henry Matawai Russel had a passion for riding horses, he died in his Hokitika home after a housefire on July 14, 2024. Photo / Supplied

Northland fixed speed cameras to get warning signs installed as part of nationwide rollout https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northland-fixed-speed-cameras-to-get-warning-signs-installed-as-part-of-nationwide-rollout/FYS4JHTSIZFG3A723SV4FNCVJE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northland-fixed-speed-cameras-to-get-warning-signs-installed-as-part-of-nationwide-rollout/FYS4JHTSIZFG3A723SV4FNCVJE/ Jenny LingThe Government is installing warning signs at speed cameras including those in Northland.
